projects.first-project-description: List of cryptocurrencies with their actual price and details of each one.
projects.second-project-description: Landing page created for 'Obras stadium', where all the events of the stadium are shown, with the detail of each one of them.
projects.third-project-description: Task manager with several functionalities: manage your tasks, visualize your projects, see a list of cryptocurrencies with their respective price, connect your wallet and see your balance, visualize events of 'Estadio obras'. Use of firebase. It has protected routes and form validation.
projects.fourth-project-description: Add series dynamically with JS, has manual mail validation.
